alert.note: Alert for Lake (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:31PM EDT until September 07 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Lake County in east central Florida... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 631 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Howey-In-the-hills, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tavares, Howey-In-the-hills, Lake Harris, Astatula and Little Lake Harris. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
